scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Vicci
scrape.text: This didn't go where I imagined it would. You sort of keep reading because it's vaguely interesting and there is an interesting element of tension, but for me it doesn't feel like it really pays off. It's a bit like chewing on a delicious chocolate that you've been looking forward to for a long time, and cerebrally you think you're enjoying it because it's creamy and caramelly and all the things you enjoy in a chocolate, but once you're finished you feel underwhelmed and wish that perhaps you'd bought the other chocolate instead.
